name: Stick Clicker 2000
description:
Stick Clicker 2000 - 2021's most intense speedgame.

Open ended: Choose which sticks to click, and in which order...

Fast-paced gameplay: In the top percentage of runners, speedruns can take as little as a few minutes.

Your goal: Click all three sticks until they pop.

Time begins on the first frame the sticks are visible. Time ends on the first frame no sticks are visible.
